# Prob & Stats

## Distributions

: (\#tab:dist) Common Distributions

| Type      | name           | Description                                    | Repr                     | Formula                                                                                       | \(\mu\)           | \(\sigma^2\)                                 | MLE                       |
| --------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| Discrete  | Geometric      | First success times                            | \(G(X)\)                 | \(p(x=k) = (1-p)^{k-1}p\)                                                                     | \(\frac{1}{p}\)   | \(\frac{1-p}{p^2}\)                          |                           |
| Discrete  | Binomial       | Sampling with replacement                      | \(B(n, p)\)              | \(p(x=k)=\binom{n}{k}p^{k}(1-p)^{n-k}\)                                                       | \(np\)            | \(np(1-p)\)                                  | \(\hat{p} = \frac{x}{n}\) |
| Discrete  | Hypergeometric | Sampling without replacement                   | \(H(n, p)\)              | \(p(x=k)=\frac{\binom{M}{k}\binom{N-M}{n-k}}{\binom{N}{N}}\)                                  | \(n\frac{M}{N}\)  | \(\frac{N-n}{N-1}n\frac{M}{N}\frac{N-M}{N}\) |                           |
| Discrete  | Poisson        | Occur times                                    | \(P(\lambda)\)           | \(p(x=k)=\frac{\lambda^{k}e^{-\lambda}}{k!}\)                                                 | \(\lambda \)      | \(\lambda\)                                  |                           |
| Continual | Uniform        | Occur with equal probability                   | \(U(a, b)\)              | \(f(x) = \begin{cases}\frac{1}{b-a} &\quad (a\le x\le b) \\ 0 &\quad (otherwise)\end{cases}\) | \(\frac{a+b}{2}\) | \(\frac{(b-a)^2}{12}\)                       |                           |
| Continual | Normal         | bell shape                                     | \(N(\mu, \sigma^{2})\)   | \(f(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma^{2}}e^{-\frac{1}{2}(\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma})^2}\)            | \(\mu\)           | \(\sigma^{2}\)                               |                           |
| Continual | Chi Square     | sum of square standard normal distribution     | \(\chi_{n}^{2}\)         | \(\chi_{n}^{2} = \sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}X_{i}^{2} \quad X_i \sim N(0,1)\)                       | \(n\)             | \(2n\)                                       |                           |
| Continual | Non Chi Square | sum of square non-standard normal distribution | \(\chi_{n,\lambda}^{2}\) | \(\chi_{n}^{2} = \sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}X_{i}^{2} \quad X_i \sim N(0,1)\)                       | \(n\)             | \(2n\)                                       |                           |
